home.home_text-3: AWS Cloud Practitioner | Computer Engineering Student
home.parrafo-info:
I’m a Computer Science student with a passion for designing solutions—both in the cloud and at a structural level.
I love exploring different areas of development, which has allowed me to build a versatile and adaptable profile.
My goal is to combine creativity and functionality to solve problems efficiently.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I’m a responsible, punctual, and organized person with a strong ability to adapt to different environments.
I’m looking for my first opportunity in the IT sector, where I can apply my skills and make a difference. I’m ready to take on new challenges and contribute effectively to a team.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: You will embark on an epic battle, far from being the conventional game and with plenty of twists and turns
proyectos.info-proyecto2: We provide a tutorial and an example of how to deploy a website using amazon S3.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills and a bit about my background.
proyectos.info-proyecto4: Mass email delivery system using AWS serverless services for automatic scalability.
